# IMAGE QUALITY SETTING (Movie Recording)

Adjust image quality settings for movies.

To display image quality settings, press **MENU/OK** in the movie shooting display and select the !Image Quality Setting Menu (IMAGE QUALITY SETTING) tab.

> ðŸ’¡ **Note:**  
> The options available vary with the shooting mode selected.

## FILM SIMULATION
Options are the same as those for still photography, but settings must be adjusted separately (ðŸ“– 106).

## MONOCHROMATIC COLOR
Options are the same as those for still photography, but settings must be adjusted separately (ðŸ“– 108).

## WHITE BALANCE
Options are the same as those for still photography, but settings must be adjusted separately (ðŸ“– 109).
